Abstract:
The MODIS Surface Reflectance products are an estimate of the surface spectral reflectance as it would be measured at ground level in the absence of atmospheric scattering or absorption. Low-level data are corrected for atmospheric gases and aerosols, yielding a level-2 basis for several higher-order gridded level-2 (L2G) and level-3 products. 

MYD09GQ provides Bands 1 and 2 at a 250-meter resolution in a daily gridded L2G product in the Sinusoidal projection. Science Data Sets provided for this product include reflectance for Bands 1 and 2, a quality rating, observation coverage, and observation number. This product is meant to be used in conjunction with the MYD09GA where important quality and viewing geometry information is stored. 

V005 Data Set Characteristics:
Area: ~10 degrees x 10 degrees lat/long 
Image Dimensions: 4800 x  4800 rows/columns 
File Size: ~85 MB 
Resolution: 250 meters 
Projection: Sinusoidal 
Data Format: HDF-EOS 
Science Data Sets (SDS HDF Layers): 5

RelatedUrls.Description: Data set landing page at the LP DAAC
Interface to search, discover, and access EOS data products, and invoke available data services.
LP DAAC Data Pool provides direct access to all currently available MODIS products and the ability to download them via HTTP.

The MODIS Reprojection Tool on the Web (MRTWeb) is available for selected MODIS land products.  MRTWebâ€™s capabilities include reprojecting to alternate map projections, spatial and spectral subsetting, resampling, and alternate output format options.

USGS EarthExplorer (EE) provides users the ability to query, search and order archived ASTER and MODIS products available from the LP DAAC.  Registered users of EE have access to additional features than guest users.

The USGS Global Visualization Viewer (GloVis) is an online search and order tool driven by browse images.  Users may select any geographical area of interest (for any given product) and view all available browse images for that area before deciding to order those products.

Near real-time (NRT) data are available from MODAPS for certain Aqua and Terra MODIS L0, L1, L2, L2G, and L3 products. Whereas the standard MODIS forward processing acquires 2-hour L0 files for Aqua and Terra from EDOS within 7-8 hours of real time, LANCE-MODIS acquires session-based L0 files from EDOS and the end of the session is available within 10-30 minutes after real time.

The Land Processes Distributed Active Archive Center (LP DAAC) is one of several discipline-specific data centers within the NASA Earth Observing System Data and Information System (EOSDIS).  The LP DAAC Web page provides information about available data products, services, documentation, order interfaces, and tools.
The MODIS Land home page is maintained through NASA's Goddard Space Flight Center and documents various aspects of the land component of the MODIS mission.
Detailed product descriptions and additional information including links for data access, user guides, and customer support, etc.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: HORIZONTALTILENUMBER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Horizontal tile number of a grid, which increases from left to right.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTGOODQUALITY
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels with good quality

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTNOTPRODUCEDOTHER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels not produced due to some reason other than cloud

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTOTHERQUALITY
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels with not so good quality

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTPOOROUTPUT500MBAND3
AdditionalAttributes.Description: The % of pixels in 500m band 3 that have a quality of our lowest class (i.e. not usable) .  A value of -1 indicates that that band was not processed.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTPOOROUTPUT500MBAND4
AdditionalAttributes.Description: The % of pixels in 500m band 4 that have a quality of our lowest class (i.e. not usable) .  A value of -1 indicates that that band was not processed.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTPOOROUTPUT500MBAND5
AdditionalAttributes.Description: The % of pixels in 500m band 5 that have a quality of our lowest class (i.e. not usable) .  A value of -1 indicates that that band was not processed.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTPOOROUTPUT500MBAND6
AdditionalAttributes.Description: The % of pixels in 500m band 6 that have a quality of our lowest class (i.e. not usable) .  A value of -1 indicates that that band was not processed.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTPOOROUTPUT500MBAND7
AdditionalAttributes.Description: The % of pixels in 500m band 7 that have a quality of our lowest class (i.e. not usable) .  A value of -1 indicates that that band was not processed.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: VERTICALTILENUMBER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Vertical tile number of a grid, which increases from top to bottom.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: TileID
AdditionalAttributes.Description: MODIS Land tile identification number which represents a geographical area on the surface of the Earth bounded by latitude and longitude coordinates.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: PROCESSVERSION
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Version of the process software that generated the product.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTPOOROUTPUT250MBAND1
AdditionalAttributes.Description: The % of pixels in 250m band 1 that have a quality of our lowest class (i.e. not usable).  A value of -1 indicates that that band was not processed.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTPOOROUTPUT250MBAND2
AdditionalAttributes.Description: The % of pixels in 250m band 2 that have a quality of our lowest class (i.e. not usable).  A value of -1 indicates that that band was not processed.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: RESOLUTIONBANDS1AND2
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Nadir spatial resolution (meters) of MODIS bands 1 and 2

EntryTitle: MODIS/Aqua Surface Reflectance Daily L2G Global 250m SIN Grid V005

Characteristics.Name: EquatorCrossingTime
Characteristics.Description: Local time of the equator crossing and direction (ascending or descending)
